name: Controlamina
description:
Shoot to win! But don't use all your power!

Controlamina is a simple 2D arena shooter : shoot all enemies that appear and move to avoid being touched by them.

But be careful: each button and key press depletes the stamina for that button, and if it reaches zero, you will be unable to move or shoot in that direction. Wait for it to refill to use again.

Each side of your character has 2 bars. The taller one (blue/cyan) is the stamina for the movement in that direction, and the wider one (yellow) is the stamina for the shot int that direction.

Commands

Use WASD to move and ARROW KEYS to shoot. If you're using a gamepad, use the digital directional and the face buttons.

Press ESC or START (gamepad) to pause/un-pause.

Press F12 for a "hard-quit" (instantly closes the game).

Desirable features and known bugs

  • tutorials for controls and mechanics
  • gamepad analog support for movement
  • remappable controls
  • feedback when being hit or hitting enemies
  • score (time and levels completed)
  • some transitions when enemies appear or die
  • sounds for actions (shooting, being hit, killing enemy, key stamina reaching zero)
  • a survival mode, with random generated levels
  • save progress and allow the player to start from any completed level
  • save configurations
  • a bit rushed, require more tests and balancing

Anything else? Tell us in the comments below.
